attributes.action: The PM Must Stop All UK Aid Being Given To India in 2012 Not In 2015!
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned demand aid being given to India is stopped before the end of 2012.
British taxpayers have spent millions on a foreign aid HQ in Delhi.
India is so rich it now runs its own space and foreign aid programmes.
There is no need whatsoever to carry on giving India aid, it must be stopped now!
